name: Base Design
overview: BASE Design supplies a total solution to E-Commerce logistic management. BASE Design logistic management service started with the industrial sector, providing optimized logistic management throughout the entire supply chain. Over a period of several years they have developed specialized algorithms and systems to customize their services for the E-Commerce industry. As part of their E-Commerce development model, BASE Design constructed a logistic management model that ensures the highest level of service with the most affordable rates available. Since they also have the capabilities of factory and warehouse management, stock management, procurement, picking and distribution they offer a reliable E-Commerce logistic management solution. Under the umbrella of the CIE Group, BASE Design integrated their specialized forecasting and scheduling services with an ERP platform.
